about_the_game:
Spice up your adventure with sexy assassin Georgina and her double hits, ability to ambush enemies, and countless other perks!

To make sure you've installed our DLC properly, go to your Steam client and click on:
Sexy Heroine! Part 3 > Properties > DLC

To use the DLC click on the following link and check the folder Sexy Assassin DLC:
Sexy Heroine! Part 3 > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files

Download and copy our special savefile directly from the Sexy Assassin DLC folder and paste it to:
C:\Users[Name]\AppData\Roaming\SEXY HEROINE! PART 3\Saves

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains nudity, bondage and sexual content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
